e: ￹`Mi~`nanam~ `kako~ `to~ `tilid~ `no~ `'Amis~.￺I an learning Amis writing￻我要學習阿美語文
￹`O~ `ni~`pananaman~ `ako~ `a~ `wawa~ `cingra~.￺He is a child I disciplined/ trained.￻他是我訓練出來的孩子
￹`Ma~`nanam~ `kako~ `a~ `maro'~ `itini~.￺I am used to living here.￻我習慣住在這裡
￹`ka~`nanam~`an~ `a~ `salikaka~￺a person you are acquainted with￻認識的信徒，熟悉的會友
￹`ka~`nanam~`an~ / `na~`namanan~ `a~ `demak~￺a habit * custom￻熟悉的工作，習慣，風俗
d.f: ￹￺to be familiar with * accustomed to￻欲對某事熟悉，習慣
